config.foreign_table_where: AND (sys_category.sys_language_uid = 0 OR sys_category.l10n_parent = 0) ORDER BY sys_category.sorting

TCEforms.label: Pause Time (How long each slide will show)
Pause On Hover (Stop animation while hovering)
Control Navigation Thumbs (Use thumbnails for Control Nav)
Random Start (Start on a random slide)
